captions.text:
- Well, hello everyone,
my name is Tyler Oakley
and I feel like it's been forever
since I've done a PO Box video,
so I was like, you know what?
(singing) It's time to open some shit,
y'all send to my PO Box.

(calypso music in background)
I should, like, honestly, have
a career writing jingles.

Between the "Q and Slay Song"
and the new "PO Box" song,
this is it.
Let's do this.
Okay, so this is from Tony from Chicago.
It says: "Tyler, you mention in a video
"that you cannot enjoy a 3-D movie

"because of the
glasses-over-glasses problem."

Yes, I can't wear the 3-D glasses
'cause I'm blind as a bat,

but then, if I put the 3-D
glasses over my regular glasses,
I have to like, hold it just so...

So, yeah, it's the worst
thing in the world.
And he says: "Please take this pair

"of 3-D clip-ons..."
(gasps)
Oh my God, wait!
Shut up, shut up, shut up...
Oh my God, 3-D clip-ons for my glasses!
Are you kidding?

I cannot wait to waltz
into the movie theater
just like this and be like,

(rapping)
"Yeahs, bitch, get in my lane.
"You can't see shit, but I can."
Ooop!
(laughs)
Thank you so much, Tony, you are the best.

Okay, so somebody gave
me a pickle and it says:

"It's a pickle", and then
on the back, it says:
"A fuckin' pickle", because you all know.
If you follow me on Vine, then you get it.
Okay, so this is from...
Who is it from?
Jay Price?

Um...
(calypso music in background)

(gasps)
No...

Oh my God.
(laughs)
This book, Corey is gonna be so jealous.
It's called "100 Beards".
Oh my God, I think it's from the author!
It's literally from the author.
It's called "100 Beards".

It's literally just
pictures of men with beards.
I'm like, "Yes, daddy, yes!"

I wanna, like, scruff all
in middle of that McGruff.

(sighs)
I'm thirsty.
Okay, so for my next package,
I already know what it is, obviously,
because it says "Warby Parker" on it,
but I get new glasses all the time now,
because Warby Parkers are only 95 bucks

and so I always have them send
me, like, pairs to try on...
You pick out five pairs online,
they send you the five pairs,
you try them on at home,
you send them back, and then they'll
send you whatever pair you want.
It's like the best thing in the world.
If you wanna try it, warbyparker.com/tyler
but usually what I do, you guys know,
I try on all five pairs for you guys

and then I let you guys
pick in the comments below.
So if you wanna help me pick,
let me know which pair I should get.

They are always coming
out with new glasses,
which is the best, and all five of these
that I'm about to show you right now

are from their Fall 2014
collection, so they're brand new.

Y'all are getting a sneak
peek just like I am, so...
yeah, let me know which ones I should get.
Number One...
Number Two...
Number Three...
Number Four...
And Number Five.

Let me know in the comments;
thank you, in advance.
And y'all know I don't talk about anything
unless I can give you guys the hook-up,
so if you like free three-day shipping,
just use warbyparker.com/tyler

and Warby Parker is kinda like
Tom's, where you buy a pair
and they give a pair to somebody in need.
So, like, you feel good about it.

Use it, love it, fall in love;
you're welcome, in advance.
Okay, so this one says, all over it,
"Please open in a PO Box video", so...
Let's see what is going on...
I'm nervous...

(laughs)
A very well done photoshop
of me with Rose and Claire.

So, Rose and Claire, I'm
assuming is who sent this.
Thank you, Rose and Claire.
Let's see.

(gasps)
Ranch dressing soda?
Do I dare?

(calypso music in background)
Should I?
Ow!

Oh, apparently not; you can't
open this without a thing.
I just hurt my fingers!
Thanks, Rose and Claire.
I'll drink it later, I swear.
Oh my God, and it even says on the bottom:
"Y'all get your fixin's!"
That's like how I speak.
Thanks, Rose and Claire, you guys get me!

Okay, so this is from Danielle
from Petaluma, California...

(humming)
Aahhh, whoop!
Oh my God, I almost dropped it.

(gasps)
Wha-- (laughs)

Oh my God, this candle,
can you even handle it?
Can you "candle" it?
It is me, the patron saint...
the patron saint of thirst, me.
Bow down; pray to me, bitches.

If you are struggling with
thirst problems, pray to me.
I will help you through it.
And it came with this letter.
But I just read the first paragraph,
and you are so sweet and I adore you.

Thank you for watching for so
long, for as long as you have.

Honestly, you are;
you're one of the people

that made my dreams
come true, so thank you.
And, this is incredible, thank you.

Keep praying to me if you
have thirst problems. (laughs)

Okay, so this one says
it's from Australia,

and which I'm excited to see
because I was just there, and--
Oh my God, wait, oh I love this!

It's from Perth, clearly,
because it says "Perth".

I was just in Perth and I
didn't bring home any souvenirs,
so thank you for this.
And a little koala keychain...
Let's just, I mean, I love you.
And a little drawing!
Thank you for this; I honestly,

every time you guys send me,
like, drawings and things,

I'm like, "I am so
untalented, it is unreal."
So, thank you for making me feel terrible
about my own artistic skills.
Okay, so this is from Mirren.
"Oh my God, you're reading this!"
Yes I am.
"You are the queen of all queens..."
True.
"...so hi, I'm Mirren, a 13-year old boy
"from Irvine, California."
Cute cute cute cute cute...
Mmmmm, this is the sweetest letter!
Okay, so it says: "I hope you enjoy
"this polymer clay mini-you I made.
"I worked really hard on it."
I'm super-excited to see this...
Oh, wait!
And it's so up-to-date, too!
With my new, like, hair...
This is actually adorable.
This is so cute!
Thank you for this!
I'm gonna make this like a little ornament
and I'm gonna put it on my Christmas tree,
because this is adorable.
Thank you.
Okay, so this is from...
doesn't say where it's from...

Great Britain, this is from
somebody in Great Britain.
(gasps)
Oh my God, I just got a sneak-peek of it
and I think I know what it is.

Is there a note in here
I can read first, or no?
Yes there is, okay.
Let me read this first.
I think I just saw what it is
and I'm already obsessed with it.
If it's what I think it is, girl...
(calypso music in background)
This says: "Dear Tyler, my name is Lottie.

"I'm a 17-year old
British fangirl and proud.

"I've been watching your
YouTube videos for a while now

"and have come to the conclusion
that you are awesome!"

Thank you.
(laughs)

Thank you for making that
conclusion, because I was nervous.
"I just have one more thing to say.
"I have a teeny, tiny YouTube channel.

"The only subscribers
are myself and my sister,

"and I was wondering if maybe
you could check it out."
Of course.
"So I saw this shirt in a shop
"and immediately thought of you."

Now let's see if what you
sent me is what I think it is.
Oh my God!
Yes yes yes yes yes!
I am wearing this in an upcoming video.
It is official: I am obsessed with this!
And it has a little note in the pocket.

It says: "For the next
time you go to Disneyland."

Honestly, I always am
like, "What do I wear?"
and this is perfect, thank you!

I'm obsessed with this;
honestly, I'm obsessed with this.

Okay, so this is
something I wanted to show
that I didn't get from my PO Box,
but I got at a YouTube convention

from Lilly and Katie
and Martha, and it says:
"For the days you're feeling down."
And it's a little jar that has all these,
like, encouragements on them.
This gift, honestly, meant so much to me

because the day that I got
it, I was really stressed
because of some personal stuff,

but I was spending all
day at the convention

and I was like, you
know, I wanted to, like,

put my best foot forward,
and I wanna, like,
have the experience of the time that we,

we finally get to meet, be
a positive one for you guys,

so when I was actually
done with the convention

and back to my hotel
room and going through

the things that you guys
gave me, I found this...
It was exactly what I needed at the time,
and I cannot thank you enough.

So, for the people that honestly
give me things like this

or send me tweets all day, or
send me messages on Tumblr,

or comment below with, you
know, the nicest things,

I see them, and it helps
me when I need it most.
Honestly, I don't know how I was so lucky

to have the people like you
guys that are in my life

actually in my life,
so, thank you for this.
Honestly, thank you.

Okay, so that is all I
have for you guys today,

but I wanna start doing
PO Box videos more often,
so I think I'm gonna do them once a month.
If that's okay with you guys,
give me a thumbs up and maybe I will.

And, uh, this is just
like a fun little way
to include you guys and say thank you

for all of the things
that you guys give me,
both material things and all the love.

It just is, like, a moment
for me to say thank you.

So let me know with a
thumbs up if I should, and,

yeah, if you wanna see my
latest video, it's right there,
and my latest podcast is right there.
It's brand new every Tuesday,

so if you're watching
this right now, enjoy.
If you wanna be my Person of the Week,
all you gotta do is buy something from
districtlines.com/tyleroakley

and send me a picture
of you being cute in it,
and you might be right there.

And, yeah, that's all I
have for you guys today.
I hope you have a fabulous life
and I will see you guys next time.
Later.
(singing unintelligibly)
That was, like, an Arianna version.

title: BOW DOWN & PRAY TO ME (PO Box #4) | Tyler Oakley
